preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM forms WHERE FORM_TYPE_ID is not null

changeSet.sql: update forms SET FORM_TYPE_ID = (SELECT ID FROM form_type where code = forms.FORM_TYPE) where FORM_TYPE_ID is null;

changeSet.author: voloide

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM carrers WHERE CARRER_TYPE_ID is not null

changeSet.sql: update carrers SET CARRER_TYPE_ID = (SELECT ID FROM career_type where code = carrers.CARRER_TYPE) where CARRER_TYPE_ID is null;

changeSet.author: voloide

preConditions.sqlCheck: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM questions WHERE QUESTION_TYPE_ID is not null

changeSet.sql: update questions SET QUESTION_TYPE_ID = (SELECT ID FROM question_type where code = questions.QUESTION_TYPE) where QUESTION_TYPE_ID is null;

changeSet.author: ialuj
voloide
changeSet.sql: CREATE or replace view temp_TUTOR_TUTORED as select DISTINCT t.id as TUTOR_ID, m.TUTORED_ID from tutors t inner join mentorships m on m.TUTOR_ID = t.ID order by t.ID;

changeSet.author: voloide
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO TUTOR_TUTORED (CREATED_AT, CREATED_BY, LIFE_CYCLE_STATUS, UPDATED_AT, UPDATED_BY, UUID, TUTOR_ID, TUTORED_ID) SELECT NOW(), '49dcfc96e18644d1ae9e82dbb7e873a1', 'ACTIVE', NULL, NULL, UUID(), TUTOR_ID, TUTORED_ID from temp_TUTOR_TUTORED ORDER BY TUTOR_ID, TUTORED_ID;

changeSet.author: voloide
changeSet.sql: drop view if exists temp_TUTOR_TUTORED;
